name: 林鈞陶
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解離散時間訊號處理之知識，包含 Z - 轉換、連續訊號取樣、線性非時變系統、濾波器設計、離散傅立葉轉換以及快速傅立葉轉換等。
schedule:
(subject to change based on class progress)
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-3: Discrete-time signals and systems
Week 4-5: Z-transform
Week 6: Midterm I
Week 7-8: Sampling of continuous-time signal
Week 9-10: LTI systems
Week 10-11: Filter design
Week 12: Midterm II
Week 13-14: Discrete Fourier transform
Week 15-16: Fast  Fourier transform
Week 17: Other topics (optional)
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Quizzes: 25%
Midterm I: 25%
Midterm II: 25%
Final: 25%
materials: A. V. Oppenheim and R. W. Schafer, Discrete-time signal processing, 3rd edition, Pearson, 2010. (暫定)
